mapper.select:
select t.*,t4.`name` userName,t1.finish_time finishTime,t2.supplier_name as supplierName,t3.note as evaStatusName from t_pss_eva_order t left join t_pss_order t1 on t.order_code = t1.order_code left join t_pss_supplier t2 on t1.supplier_code = t2.supplier_code left join t_pss_dict t3 on t.eva_status = t3.`code` and t3.type = 'pjzt' left join t_pss_user t4 on t.opt_user = t4.user_id where 1=1
and t.id = #{id}
